name: 東方翠神廻廊 〜 Faith in the Goddess of Suwa.
description: It is a secondary creation game of the Touhou Project. All the characters of the original appear, more than 130 characters will appear. Let's organize a party at them and solve the incident!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7(64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7-5500U Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 650 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1(64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7-5500U Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 650 MB available space
